content:
Yes, I can recommend some resorts in Bali that have excellent spa facilities:

1. COMO Shambhala Estate - recognized as one of the best spas in Bali, their holistic approach offers a wide range of treatments such as Ayurveda, hydrotherapy, and reflexology.

2. Mandapa, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve - their signature spa uses natural ingredients and ancient Balinese techniques to provide a customized wellness journey for each guest.

3. Four Seasons Resort Bali at Sayan - their riverside spa provides treatments tailored to the guest's needs with a focus on holistic wellness.

4. The Mulia - this resort offers luxurious spa experiences, including chromotherapy, sound therapy, and a range of massage treatments.

5. The St. Regis Bali Resort - their award-winning Remède Spa offers a range of services, from rejuvenating facials to body treatments and traditional Balinese massages.

These resorts have excellent spa facilities that provide a relaxing and rejuvenating experience for their guests.
